Gordan,

I'm using maven to compile the source. I'm using following comman=
ds.
maven java:compile
maven test
Once this is done a jar file under target=
 directory is created. Now
how can we execute heritrix using this jar file.=


Actually I'm trying to customize heritrix to increase the number of
conne=
ctions, so that we can crawl the site at faster rate, but cant
get anywhere=
. Any further assistance would be appreciated.

Thanks,
Ram.
